reviewText: Gentle Ben is a favorite of mine because some of the best actors star in it. Dennis Weaver is and all time favorite of mine. He does a fine job in anything he plays in. It is in a location that is beautiful and shows some of the best shots of natural habitat. It is a pleasure to watch little animals scurry around and watch the waterfowl. I love the air boats. Little Mark sure is a fine boy and sure loves Ben his bear. it is a series for children and the whole family. It is clean and decent and that's more than we can say for some others/
Title: Gentle Ben: Season 1

reviewText: THERE WAS NO Internet research or Discovery Channel nature features for fact checking in the ‘60s. So, when we hear about a show – or remember it from the past – about a child and his pet black bear, it's understood nostalgia is involved.An 8-year-old Clint Howard, brother to Ron of “The Andy Griffith Show” and big-time adult movie director, played Dennis Weaver’s son in “Gentle Ben.” It might be called a family fantasy series. Weaver plays a warden in the Florida Everglades, where he, his wife and son live with a free roaming, 650 pound black bear. The boy and his bear have adventures and teach lessons to the misguided people they meet along the way.We’ve seen in local news lately how black bears, their environment fading due to ever-encroaching suburbia, have entered neighborhoods in search of food. They’re mostly young males, just looking for snacks, lady bears and a new home. We have all been cautioned to stay away from the claws and teeth – even as the bear takes to the trees to escape us.Producers of “Gentle Ben” didn't have these concerns and probably thought having a big bear for a playmate was sound and fun.Not much so for young Howard, who sometimes found himself mauled by the guest animals. We learn in commentary, a frightened raccoon made its escape over Howard’s chest, shoulders and arms once, leaving a shredded shirt and a bloody boy behind. After a trip to the ER, costumers made the child a vest of thin leather he could wear under his clothes for protection. In Florida. In the summer.Other times, he would have a treat in his pocket or be smeared with something tasty to make a critter appear affectionate.Howard, himself, seems more nostalgic relating his “Gentle Ben” memories. Older brother Ron guest stars with Clint in an early episode. Ron plays a bully who wants a bear of his own and will stop at nothing to get one. Clint recalls that Ron didn't play the “bad boy” very often, and seems delighted that it happened on his show.Bet Sheriff Andy wouldn't have allowed Opie to have a big black bear for a pet.There are 28 episodes on four discs in this set; its fuzzy video and mono sound show its age. Still, youngsters should love it; it’s fun to be the 8-year-old who teaches grown-ups a thing or two. As long as the grown-ups remember to keep them away from the wildlife.
summary: They don't make 'em the way they used to - thank goodness
Title: Gentle Ben: Season 1

reviewText: Airing for 56 (30 minute) episodes from Sept. 10, '67 to August 31, '69 on CBS, the endearing television classic GENTLE BEN stars one of my favorite actors - Dennis Weaver - as Wildlife officer "Tom Wedloe" and then child star Clint Howard as his son "Mark". The series centers around Mark's relationship with a black bear named "Ben" and is set in/and around the Florida Everglades. Beth Brickell plays Tom's wife "Ellen". This series has been long coming and it's good to see it finally getting a release date set for October 15, 2013. As there are no episode listings, I have included them below with a brief summary and special guest assignment.A few of the notable guest stars will include:Mala Powers, Ron Howard, Bud Irwin, Albert Salmi, Burt Reynolds, Ric Applewhite, Howard Da Silva, Slim Pickens, Pat Hingle, William Windom, Strother Martin, and many more!The episode list for this season one release will include:1. HURRICANE COMING - Ben leads a group to safety during a hurricane.2. GREEN-EYED BEAR - Ben gets jealous when a family adopts a rescued cub.3. FISH ANCH CHIPS - Poachers threaten Mark Wedloe and Ben.4. GATOR MAN - A new friend's father turns out to be an alligator poacher.5. VOICE IN THE WILDERNESS - A plane, loaded with zoo animals, crashes in the Florida Everglades.6. INVASION OF WILLLIE SAM GOPHER - Mark tries to convince a father to send his son to school.7. RESTLESS BEAR - Ben fights for his life against a wild bear.8. BATTLE OF WEDLOE'S WOODS - A developer plans to build a housing development in the Everglades.9. WARDEN FOR MAN AND BEAST - A man and his performing bear retire.10. A WASTE OF HONEY - A pair of strangers plunders beehives.11. JENNIFER - A cougar threatens a girl lost in the Everglades.12. WARDEN IN THE BEAR PIT - Two men stage a fight between a dog and Ben.13. A MEDAL FOR BEN - Mark's mother gets pinned beneath her overturned car.14. THE RANSOM - Ben is kidnapped.15. WAYWARD BEAR (PART 1) - Ben disappears after being locked in a truck.16. WAYWARD BEAR (PART 2) - A retired circus couple treats wounded Ben.17. THE OPPORTUNIST - Animal thieves invade the Everglades.18. BATTLE OF BIRTHDAY BAY - Cougars crash Mark and Tom's birthday party.19. TROPHY BEAR - An unscrupulous hunting guide sets Ben up as a target for a wealthy hunter.20. MAMA JOLIE - Mark tries to restore Ben's appetite.21. BATTER UP - Baseball star Bob Gibson teaches Mark about sportsmanship.22. GROWING PAINS - Ben runs away.23. FIRE IN THE GLADES - A raging fire threatens Mark and Ben.24. TAKE A GIANT STEP - A fisherman's son runs away.25. SURVIVAL IN THE SWAMP - Fugitive brothers abduct the game warden.26. WHO'S AFRAID? - Virginia tries to prove her courage.27. GREENER PASTURES - The game warden is offered an executive position in the city.28. OL' JOE'S GOTTA GO - A farmer accuses an alligator of stealing.Subtitles in English included for the hearing impaired.
summary: GENTLE BEN - ANOTHER VINTAGE TV CLASSIC GETS A RELEASE DATE!
Title: Gentle Ben: Season 1

reviewText: I remember this show as a child mostly because of Dennis Weaver ,(Gunsmoke) but also that way cool airboat. also their friend's  swamp buggie gets kudos from me being as I am "Mechanically enclined", these things appeal to me . The show itself is very much like Flipper but with a bear! If you like Flipper , or airboats you'll probably like this show as well.
Title: Gentle Ben: Season 1

reviewText: If you enjoy watching episodes of Flipperyou will enjoy this, its the same storyformula by Ivan Tors it has Dennis Weaverand Clint Howard, Ron Howard of MayberryRFD's little brother. Its a pretty good show.
Title: Gentle Ben: Season 1

reviewText: I LOVED THIS WHEN I SAW THIS ON THE TV.  I CAN NOT WAIT TO ADD THIS TO MY VAST MOVIE COLLECTION.
Title: Gentle Ben: Season 1
